title: Day 48: God's Presence (2021)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike reflects on God's presence to his people, and how that makes his chosen people distinct. Today's readings are Exodus 33-34, Leviticus 24, and Psalm 80.
description:
